parameters.name: project
parameters.label: GCP Project Name
parameters.helpText: GCP Project Name for dataflow pipeline and assets (not project id number)

parameters.name: context
parameters.label: UI Mapping Context
parameters.helpText: Mapping information from UI.  Includes tablename, field details.

parameters.name: secret
parameters.label: Credential Secret Name.
parameters.helpText: Name of GCP Secret that must be accessed to gain application credentials for various clients.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.label: GCS Bucket Name.
parameters.helpText: Bucket common name for pipeline assets, logs, etc. (not fully qualified path)
